property.name: summary
property.value: The Deadline Date of the Proposal

property.name: description
property.value: The date in which the proposal is due to the sponsoring agency. Additional deadlines may be set by the office authorized to submit proposals on behalf of the institution (e.g. sponsored programs, etc.).

property.name: summary
property.value: The Deadline Time of the Proposal

property.name: description
property.value: The time in which the proposal is due to the sponsoring agency. Additional deadlines may be set by the office authorized to submit proposals on behalf of the institution (e.g. sponsored programs, etc.).

property.name: summary
property.value: The Deadline Type for this Proposal.

property.name: description
property.value: Indicates the type of proposal deadline.

property.name: description
property.value: The number of paper copies of the proposal that should be mailed to the agency/sponsor.

property.name: description
property.value: This field determines whether the Sponsored Programs Office or the department will be mailing the proposal to the agency/sponsor.

property.name: description
property.value: The method by which the proposal will be delivered to the agency/sponsor.

property.name: description
property.value: The internal school account number that should be charged the mailing costs.

property.name: description
property.value: Any information that will assist in the delivery of the proposal.
